subject: Allotment/retention of Government accommodation to members;NHAI
text: 2 921 A-12025442012-E.II (B) GOVERNMENT OF INDIA MINISTRY OF ROAD TRANSPORT & HIGHWAYS 73 #/ccrrliy (ESTABLISHMENT II (B) SECTION) o;/3/ Dated 25"h March, 2014 To The Chairman, National Highways Authority of India , G-586, Sector 10, Dwarka, New Delhi 110075 Sub: Allotment Retention of Government accommodation to Members, National Highway Authority of India(NHAI): Sir , am directed to forward herewith a copy of O.M; No. 11013/0/2/2001-Po1 I dated 25th March, 2014 from Ministry Of Urban Development on the above subject, In this regard it is also to say that the approval of Cabinet Committee on Accommodation (CCA) on the subject was already conveyed to NHAI through our letter of even number dated' 12th March, 2014(copy enclosed): You are requested to take necessary zction under intimation to this ministry: Yours faithfully Muia (H.R; Meena) Under Secretary to Govt. of India Enclosed as above. m( #
